channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Belgium, a group of volunteers makes drones for Ukraine in special workshops
item.description: A group of hobbyists in Belgium make drones that help on the frontline of a war.

item.title: The pope urges the faithful on Christmas to shed indifference in the face of suffering
item.description: During his first Christmas Day message, Pope Leo XIV highlighted the suffering in Gaza, Yemen and among migrants, and called for peace in troubled reg...

item.title: A holiday tradition: David Sedaris reads from 'The Santaland Diaries'
item.description: Writer and humorist David Sedaris reads from his holiday essay "The Santaland Diaries."

item.title: Morning Edition hosts play 'Do You Know Your Ho-Ho-Ho!'
item.description: Morning Edition hosts Michel Martin and Leila Fadel answer holiday trivia questions compiled by Southern Living Magazine.

item.title: The real ping pong champion — and hustler — who inspired 'Marty Supreme'
item.description: Marty Reisman was nicknamed "The Needle" for his slender physique. He dressed well and put on a show.

item.title: Brazil ex-President Jair Bolsonaro's surgery for hernia 'successful'
item.description: The former leader is serving a 27-year sentence for plotting a coup after losing the 2022 presidential election.

item.title: Democratic lawmaker sues to remove Trump's name from Kennedy Center
item.description: Rep Joyce Beatty, who sits on the centre's board, argues the name change is illegal because it requires approval from Congress.

item.title: Waterskiing Santas and giant cuts of meat: Christmas around the world
item.description: From London to Bethlehem, services and festivities to mark the holiday cheer are in full swing.

item.title: 12/21: Sunday Morning
item.description: Hosted by Jane Pauley. Featured: the town that inspired "It's a Wonderful Life"; Sean Ono Lennon on his parents' legacy; the a capella group Pentatoni...

item.title: Virtual reality opens doors for older people to build closer connections in real life
Watch: Pope Leo's plea for peace in Christmas message
item.description: Pope Leo calls for an end to conflicts around the world in Christmas speech.

item.title: Zelenskyy says he had "very good conversation" with U.S. envoys on Christmas
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he discussed "substantive details" of a Ukraine-Russia peace deal with President Trump's envoys Steve Wit...

item.title: 12/21: Face The Nation
item.description: This week on "Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan," Republican Rep. Thomas Massie and Democratic Rep. Ro Khanna join to discuss the newest batch of ...

item.title: New storm hitting waterlogged Southern California could cause more flooding and mudslides
More severe weather in store for a soaked California, raising mudslide risk
item.description: More severe weather is forecast for an already soaked California, raising risk of additional mudslides and debris flows.

item.title: Single ticket wins Powerball's $1.817 billion Christmas Eve jackpot
item.description: A single winning ticket was sold for Powerball's Christmas Eve jackpot of $1.817 billion, in Arkansas. It was the second-largest U.S. lottery jackpot ...

item.title: Public release of Epstein records puts Maxwell under fresh scrutiny amid her claims of innocence
item.description: British socialite and onetime Jeffrey Epstein girlfriend Ghislaine Maxwell is back in the spotlight with the public release of investigative records t...

item.title: Pope Leo urges 'courage' to end Ukraine war in first Christmas address
item.description: The pope also laments the condition of Palestinians during his address to worshippers at the Vatican.
